_header: Saint Michael the Archangel and his fellows also
Note: Part III consists of scientific material and is not related to the legendary material; see 5451. For Part II, see 4731.
Bibliographic Ghosts: London, British Library Cotton Julius D.IX: Part II only.
_description: Legend of St. Michael in the South English Legendary, Part I — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
Seyn Michel þe archangel & is felawes alsoBeþ bituene
                    god & ous to scewe wat we schulle do…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou god uor þe loue of seynt Michel ous let such lif
                    ledeþat we mote to heuene come after þat we beþ
                    dede
BodAsh43.Note: With II elsewhere in the MS (see 4731-1).

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint mychel þe arcangel & his felawis al sobeþ by
                    twene god & vs to techen what we scholde do…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& for þe mony fayre meraklis þat þoruȝ
                    seint mychel comhem let halwen myȝelmasseday þorwȝ out al
                    cristindom

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Michel þe Archangel and hise felawes alsoBeon bitwene
                    God and vs to schewe what we schule do…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And for þe Monye feire Miracle þat of Seint Mihel
                    comHe hit halewe Mihelmasse day þorwh al cristendom
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEynt MIȝhel þe Archaungel and is felawes alsoHuy beoth
                    bi tweone ore louerd and us to schewi ȝwat we schulle
                    do…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…And also for þe miracle þoruȝ seint Miȝhel
                    comMiȝheles masse day he hiet halewi þoruȝ al
                    cristindom
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Legende des heilige Michael nach MS Laud 108.” 
             Jahrbuch für romanische und englische Sprache und
                Literatur
         13 (1874): 150-80: 154-80.
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 299-322.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Michel þe archangel & his felawes alsobeoþ
                    bitwene vs & god to teche what we shul do…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…And for many faire miracles þat þorw seint Michel
                    comLet halwe Michelmasse day
                    þorw al cristendom
BodLauMis463.Note:
Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line; last two lines
                    written in wrong order, corrected by marginal indications.

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Sayn myghell þe archangell & hiis felaws alsoAre be twene
                    god & vs to chew what we sall doA day þei hafe in þe
                    ȝere thuþh all cristindamBe a meracle of sayn myghell þat
                    holy day ys cam…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…ffro þat fire he vs cheld þat lord is most of
                    myghtThurgh þe praier of Sayn Myghell prynce of angels
                    bryght

CULFf548.First Lines:
Sant Michaell þe Archangell & his fellaghes alsoEr be
                    twene god & vs to schewe quat we shall do…
CULFf548.Last Lines:
…And ye fayre miracles þat of saynt myghell comeGart
                    halow myghelmas day thorow out all cristendome
CULFf548.Editions:
Downing,  Janay Young A.,
                        ed.  
             “A Critical Edition of Cambridge University MS Ff.5.48.” 
         2 vols. Diss. University of Washington, 1969: 215-27.

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein Michel þe archangle and is felawes alsoBeoþ bitwene
                    god and us to teche wat we ssolle do…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…And for þe mani vair miracle þat þoru sein michel
                    comHet halwi myhelmasse day þoru al cristendom
CamCCC145.Attributed Title: De Sancto Michaele in monte Gargano (f. 149)
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 2.402-28.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Michel þe Archaungel and his ffelawes al soBeoþ by
                    twene god and vs to teche what we schulleþ do…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…And ffor þe miracle al so þat of Seint Michel comLe
                    let halwy Miȝelmasse day þorw al cristendom

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint mychel þe archangel & his felawes alsobeþ by
                    twene god & ous to teche wat we schulle do…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…& for þe many faire miracle þat þorwe seint
                    michel comhe hete holde mychel masseday þorwe al
                    cristendom

Digital Facsimile of Trinity College Cambridge MS R.3.25.

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEin Michel þe archangel & is felawes alsoBeþ by
                    twene god & vs to teche wat we ssolledo…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…& for þe Many feyre miracle þat þoru sein
                    Michel comHet halwey Michel masse day þoru al cristendom
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De sancto Michael in Monte gargano (f. 170, by scribe in margin
                    beside first line); Michaele in Monte gargano (RT)

BLEge1993.First Lines: SEint Michel þe archangel & is felawes alsoBeþ bitwene god and vs to techen what we schulden do…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …And for þe fele miracles þat of seint Miȝhel comHet halewe miȝhelmasse day þorw al cristendom;

BLEge2891.First Lines: …In þe on ende of pulle a gret hul þer [   ] and heyþe hul gargan is icluped for a man was þer ney…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …And for þe many fair miracle þat þoru sein Michel comHet halwy myhelmasse day þoru al cristendom
BLEge2891.Note: With II and III; lines 1-4 missing. Begins incomplete due to missing folio or folios between 135 and 136.

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEint Michel þarcangle & his felawes alsoBeoþ bituene god & ous to teche what we schulle do…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …& for þe holi stede & of Seint Micheles holi dede& for þe meni faire miracles þat þurf Seint Michel comLet halewy Miȝele masse day þurf al cristendom
BLHar2277.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library Harley MS 2277.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?index=0&ref=Harley_MS_2277.
BLHar2277.Editions:
Mätzner,  Edouard Adolf Ferdinand. 
             Altenglische Sprachproben, I: Poesie.
         Berlin: Wiedmann, 1867: 137-47.

BLSto949.First Lines: Seynt Michel þe archangel and is felawes echonbeþ in tune god & vs to schewe war we schools don…
BLSto949.Last Lines: …And vor þe vayre miracle þat þoru Seynt Michel comHet holde holy seynt Micheles day þoru al crystenedom

CollArmsAr8.First Lines:
SEynte Michel the Arhcuangel and his felawes alsoBen bytwen god and
                    vs to teche vs what we shull do…
CollArmsAr8.Last Lines:
…And for the fayre myracles that thorow seinte Mychel comeHe
                    dyd halowe mychelmasse day thurgh all crystendome

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Mighel þe archaungel & his felawes alsoÞai ben
                    bitwene oure lord & vs to shewe what we shul do…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…And also þurȝ þe Miracle þat by saynt Mighel
                    comeMichelmasse day he let halowe þurȝ all
                    cristendome

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seint Michael þe archaungel and his felous alsoBene bitwene
                    god and vs to teche what we shul do…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…In erþly paradys some beþ alsoAnd in oþer
                    places on erth her penaunce to do
